add_area.title: Area
add_area.description: Add parks, buildings, lakes or other areas to the map.
add_area.tail: Click on the map to start drawing an area, like a park, lake, or building.

add_line.title: Line
add_line.description: Add roads, streets, footpaths, canals or other lines to the map.
add_line.tail: Click on the map to start drawing a road, path, or route.

add_point.title: Point
add_point.description: Add restaurants, monuments, post boxes or other points to the map.
add_point.tail: Click on the map to add a point.

draw_area.tail: Click to add nodes to your area. Click the first node to finish the area.

draw_line.tail: Click to add more nodes to the line. Click on other lines to connect to them, and double-click to end the line.

annotation.vertex: Added a node to a way.

continue.title: Continue
continue.not_eligible: No line can be continued here.
continue.multiple: Several lines can be continued here. To choose a line, press the Shift key and click on it to select it.

change_role.annotation: Changed the role of a relation member.

circularize.title: Circularise
circularize.not_closed: This can't be made circular because it's not a loop.
circularize.too_large: This can't be made circular because not enough of it is currently visible.
circularize.connected_to_hidden: This can't be made circular because it is connected to a hidden feature.

orthogonalize.title: Square

description.line: Square the corners of this line.
description.area: Square the corners of this area.

annotation.line: Squared the corners of a line.
annotation.area: Squared the corners of an area.

orthogonalize.not_squarish: This can't be made square because it is not squarish.
orthogonalize.too_large: This can't be made square because not enough of it is currently visible.
orthogonalize.connected_to_hidden: This can't be made square because it is connected to a hidden feature.

straighten.title: Straighten
straighten.too_bendy: This can't be straightened because it bends too much.
straighten.connected_to_hidden: This line can't be straightened because it is connected to a hidden feature.

delete.title: Delete

annotation.vertex: Deleted a node from a way.

delete.incomplete_relation: This feature can't be deleted because it hasn't been fully downloaded.
delete.part_of_relation: This feature can't be deleted because it's part of a larger relation. You must remove it from the relation first.
delete.connected_to_hidden: This can't be deleted because it is connected to a hidden feature.

add_member.annotation: Added a member to a relation.

delete_member.annotation: Removed a member from a relation.

annotation.point: Connected a way to a point.
annotation.line: Connected a way to a line.
annotation.area: Connected a way to an area.

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.description: Disconnect these lines/areas from each other.
disconnect.not_connected: There aren't enough lines/areas here to disconnect.
disconnect.connected_to_hidden: This can't be disconnected because it is connected to a hidden feature.

merge.title: Merge
merge.not_adjacent: These features can't be merged because they aren't connected.
merge.restriction: These features can't be merged because at least one is a member of a "{relation}" relation.
merge.incomplete_relation: These features can't be merged because at least one hasn't been fully downloaded.
merge.conflicting_tags: These features can't be merged because some of their tags have conflicting values.

move.title: Move
move.description: Move this to a different location.

annotation.vertex: Moved a node in a way.

move.incomplete_relation: This feature can't be moved because it hasn't been fully downloaded.
move.too_large: This can't be moved because not enough of it is currently visible.
move.connected_to_hidden: This can't be moved because it is connected to a hidden feature.

rotate.title: Rotate
rotate.description: Rotate this object around its centre point.
rotate.too_large: This can't be rotated because not enough of it is currently visible.
rotate.connected_to_hidden: This can't be rotated because it is connected to a hidden feature.

reverse.title: Reverse
reverse.description: Make this line go in the opposite direction.

split.title: Split

description.line: Split this line into two at this node.
description.area: Split the boundary of this area into two.
description.multiple: Split the lines/area boundaries at this node into two.

split.not_eligible: Lines can't be split at their beginning or end.
split.multiple_ways: There are too many lines here to split.
split.connected_to_hidden: This can't be split because it is connected to a hidden feature.

help.select: Click to select a road segment.

browser_notice: This editor is supported in Firefox, Chrome, Safari, Opera, and Internet Explorer 11 and above. Please upgrade your browser or use Potlatch 2 to edit the map.

status.offline: The API is offline. Please try editing later.
status.readonly: The API is read-only. You will need to wait to save your changes.

commit.title: Save Changes
commit.upload_explanation: The changes you upload will be visible on all maps that use OpenStreetMap data.
commit.upload_explanation_with_user: The changes you upload as {user} will be visible on all maps that use OpenStreetMap data.

geocoder.no_results_visible: No results in visible map area

inspector.no_documentation_combination: There is no documentation available for this tag combination
inspector.no_documentation_key: There is no documentation available for this key

gpx.drag_drop: Drag and drop a .gpx file on the page, or click the button to the right to browse

amenity/fuel.name: Petrol Station
amenity/fuel.terms: gas, fuel, propane, diesel, lng, cng, biodiesel
